Package org.mythdroid.util

Interface Summary
ConnMgr.onConnectListener Implement this to create a callback that'll be called upon a successful connection
 

Class Summary
ConnMgr A TCP connection manager
DatabaseUtil Manage a sqlite database of frontends
ErrUtil Error reporting utility methods
HttpFetcher A utility class for fetching stuff via HTTP
LogUtil Debug logging class
PhoneUtil Utility methods for dealing with Contacts
Reflection Wrap classes that are only present in newer SDK versions so that we can test for their presence and use them if they're there
Reflection.rActionBar Wrapped ActionBar
Reflection.rContactsContract Wrapped ContactsContract
Reflection.rPowerManager Wrapped PowerManager
Reflection.rStrictMode Wrapped StrictMode
SocketUtil Socket Utilities - mostly for managing muxed (encrypted) connections
SocketUtil.MuxedSocket A Socket that will mux (and, if possible, encrypt) connections
SocketUtil.PlainSocket A plain old Socket that sets TCPNoDelay and a default timeout
UpdateService An update checker for MythDroid and MDD
UPnPListener Utilities for finding devices via UPnP
 

Enum Summary
ConnMgr.timeOut Read timeout values for use with setTimeout()
